Text: FW Design Agency for EnronOnlineHi Mark Theres no problem using our own NDA We are hoping to have our kick off meeting tomorrow morning and wed like to have the NDA in place by then if possible We only have three weeks from the kick off until actual delivery of files on Nov We will need the rest of November and December for building the website and testing internally to meet our January preAnalyst Meeting launch Thank you for your time I really appreciate both your and Tanas assistance Heather Original Message From Greenberg Mark Sent Thursday October AM To Alon Heather Cc Bess Erica Jones Tana Subject RE Design Agency for EnronOnline Heather Thanks for the information At this time we prefer to use our form documents I understand that Tana is currently working on the NDA for this company based upon information Erica provided As to the form of agreement I can probably have something by the end of the day tomorrow for Advancedcom to look at Please let me know what the agressive schedule is Thanks Mark Original Message From Alon Heather Sent Wednesday October PM To Greenberg Mark Subject Design Agency for EnronOnline Importance High Hi Mark As Erica mentioned we are going to move forward with advancedcom to redo the EnronOnline website I will be the primary point of contact between Enron and the agency but please cc Erica Bess as well Here is the contract and the twoway NDA advancedcom sent over True to Enron form we are pushing a very aggressive schedule so please let me know if you need any other additional information or if I can be of any assistance in any way File Enron Services Agreementpdf File NonDisclosure Agreement Enronpdf Thanks Heather Original Message From Bess Erica Sent Wednesday October AM To Greenberg Mark Cc Jones Tana Alon Heather Subject RE Design Agency for EnronOnline Importance High Tony Novak Advanced Studios Pacific Coast Highway Dana Point CA Tel Fax Original Message From Greenberg Mark Sent Wednesday October AM To Bess Erica Cc Jones Tana Subject RE Design Agency for EnronOnline Erica Please provide me with the necessary information on the company eg contact name address etc Ill make sure that we get the confidentiality agreement moving forward Thanks Mark Original Message From Bess Erica Sent Wednesday October AM To Greenberg Mark Cc Alon Heather Subject Design Agency for EnronOnline Importance High Mark We have selected Advanced Studios as the agency to do EnronOnlines redesign Please prepare a NonDisclosure Agreement for them and let me know what other documents we need and how to proceed Their mailing address is Pacific Coast Highway Dana Point CA Our point of contact is Tony Novak Thanks Erica x

RE NDA Advanced StudiosThanks you Tana Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday October AM To Alon Heather Cc Bess Erica Greenberg Mark Subject NDA Advanced Studios Per our discussion attached is the referenced NDA for transmittal to counterparty File advanced studiosdoc

EnronOnline Phase III Designspst Hi Louise Weve made some great headway with the agency in terms of concepts for the new look of EnronOnline We have one week left to lock down the design before we start building it and I would love to take a few minutes to show you the designs Would you happen to have some time this week to go over the concepts Take care Heather Alon EnronOnline
Fortunes articlepst Hi Louise Here is the final layout for the fortune article just wanted to get your seal of approval Have a great weekend Heather

RE Saturday Night Cc Hey Girls Ive been to Baba Yega a few times just there last week nothing too exciting I would love to try La Vista Never even heard of that Is anyone else as ecstatic as me that today is Friday Yahooooooo Original Message From Gillette Lisa Sent Friday October AM To Alon Heather Ferrara Julie Taylor Sarah Schultea Adriane Hernandez Lorie Scott Susan M Cc Simpson Yvette Subject Saturday Night Girls We are planning to meet at Yvettes Milford at I believe everyone recalls how to get there I have places in mind but please bring other suggestions I just figured none of us have been to either of these Baba Yega profile La Vista profile Heather email me and let me know if you would like me to pick up your tshirt for tomorrow for you Also we are supposed to be at the SSK House at am and it is right down the street from me so let me know if you would like to go together see you all soon lisa
Price Limit OrdersI am working on a postcard for price limit orders and was hoping you could review the text and let me know if there are any changes to be made Thanks Heather

Commission Cardam working on this card for Andy Zipper and Dan Diamond would you please review this content If you have any questions regarding the information please contact Dan Diamond at CardProofppt Thanks Heather
